markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2851) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
You have one or more hands free.

</column>

---

You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults. You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you until the start of your next turn, as long as you continue to meet the requirements.

<title level="2">Spell Parry leads to...</title>
[Preternatural Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2879)
name: Spell Parry
requirement: You have one or more hands free.
requirement_markdown: You have one or more hands free.
